name: ExactCost
overview: ExactCost, Inc. operates as an application service provider (ASP) for the healthcare industry in Florida. It offers ExactCost Solution that enables healthcare administrators and managers to view their costs and operations; ExactCost Lab solution for clinical and diagnostic laboratory and pathology services managers; ExactCost Rad solution for radiology and diagnostic imaging services managers; ExactCost O.R. for operating rooms and surgical services managers; ExactCost Physician Group for physician groups and multi-specialty practices managers; and ExactCost Dental for dental groups and practices managers. The company also provides ExactCost Web-based application tools, such as ExactCost Synapse that connects clinical, financial, and operational data and knowledge with data dictionaries; ExactCost ABC, a cost and profitability analysis tool; ExactCost ABM, a business process management tool; and ExactCost materials management, a production inventory management tool. In addition, ExactCost, Inc. operates as a healthcare performance technology company that offers activity-based costing (ABC)/activity-based management (ABM) solutions to hospitals and other healthcare delivery providers in the areas of clinical and diagnostic laboratory, diagnostic radiology, surgical services, and general administration. Further, it offers professional services, training, and ongoing support to assist healthcare organizations to implement the companyâ€™s activity-based applications and performance management framework. ExactCost, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Hallandale Beach, Florida.

funding_rounds.source_description: ExactCost Recapitalizes With $8.5M Led By Flagship Ventures
